verses.verse: A false<WH4820> balance<WH3976> is an abomination<WH8441> to Jehovah<WH3068>; But a just<WH8003> weight<WH68> is his delight<WH7522>.
When pride<WH2087> cometh<WH935>, then cometh<WH935> shame<WH7036>; But with the lowly<WH6800> is wisdom<WH2451>.
The integrity<WH8538> of the upright<WH3477> shall guide<WH5148> them<WH5558>; But the perverseness of the treacherous<WH898> shall destroy them<WH7703>.
Riches <WH1952> profit<WH3276> not in the day<WH3117> of wrath<WH5678>; But righteousness<WH6666> delivereth<WH5337> from death<WH4194>.
The righteousness<WH6666> of the perfect<WH8549> shall direct<WH3474> his way<WH1870>; But the wicked<WH7563> shall fall<WH5307> by his own wickedness<WH7564>.
The righteousness<WH6666> of the upright<WH3477> shall deliver<WH5337> them<WH898>; But the treacherous shall be taken<WH3920> in their own iniquity<WH1942>.
When a wicked<WH7563> man<WH120> dieth<WH4194>, his expectation<WH8615> shall perish<WH6>; And the hope<WH8431> of iniquity<WH205> perisheth<WH6>.
The righteous<WH6662> is delivered out<WH2502> of trouble<WH6869>, And the wicked<WH7563> cometh in his stead<WH935>.
With his mouth<WH6310> the godless<WH2611> man destroyeth<WH7843> his neighbor<WH7453>; But through knowledge<WH1847> shall the righteous<WH6662> be delivered<WH2502>.
When it goeth well<WH2898> with the righteous<WH6662>, the city<WH7151> rejoiceth<WH5970>; And when the wicked<WH7563> perish<WH6>, there is shouting<WH7440>.
By the blessing<WH1293> of the upright<WH3477> the city<WH7176> is exalted<WH7311>; But it is overthrown<WH2040> by the mouth<WH6310> of the wicked<WH7563>.
He that despiseth<WH936> his neighbor<WH7453> is void<WH2638> of wisdom<WH3820>; But a man<WH376> of understanding<WH8394> holdeth his peace<WH2790>.
He that goeth about as a tale-bearer<WH1980> revealeth<WH1540> secrets<WH5475>; But he that is of a faithful<WH539> spirit<WH7307> concealeth<WH3680> a matter<WH1697>.
Where no wise guidance<WH8458> is<WH5971>, the people falleth<WH5307>; But in the multitude<WH5971> of counsellors<WH3289> there is safety<WH8668>.
He that is surety<WH6148> for a stranger<WH2114> shall smart<WH7321> for it<WH8130>; But he that hateth suretyship<WH8628> is secure<WH982>.
A gracious<WH2580> woman<WH802> obtaineth<WH8551> honor<WH3519>; And violent<WH6184> men obtain<WH8551> riches<WH6239>.
The merciful<WH2617> man<WH376> doeth good<WH1580> to his own soul<WH5315>; But he that is cruel<WH394> troubleth<WH5916> his own flesh<WH7607>.
The wicked<WH7563> earneth<WH6213> deceitful<WH8267> wages<WH6468>; But he that soweth<WH2232> righteousness<WH6666> hath a sure<WH571> reward<WH7938>.
He that is stedfast in righteousness<WH6666> shall attain unto life<WH2416>; And he that pursueth<WH7291> evil<WH7451> doeth it to his own death<WH4194>.
They that are perverse<WH6141> in heart<WH3820> are an abomination<WH8441> to Jehovah<WH3068>; But such as are perfect<WH8549> in their way<WH1870> are his delight<WH7522>.
Though hand<WH3027> join in hand<WH3027>, the evil<WH7451> man shall not be unpunished<WH5352>; But the seed<WH2233> of the righteous<WH6662> shall be delivered<WH4422>.
As a ring<WH5141> of gold<WH2091> in a swine<WH2386>'s snout<WH639>, So is a fair<WH3303> woman<WH802> that is without<WH5493> discretion<WH2940>.
The desire<WH8378> of the righteous<WH6662> is only good<WH2896>; But the expectation<WH8615> of the wicked<WH7563> is wrath<WH5678>.
There is<WH3426> that scattereth<WH6340>, and increaseth<WH3254> yet more<WH2820>; And there is that withholdeth more than is meet<WH3476>, but it tendeth only to want<WH4270>.
The liberal<WH1293> soul<WH5315> shall be made fat<WH1878>; And he that watereth<WH7301> shall be watered also himself<WH3384>.
He that withholdeth<WH4513> grain<WH1250>, the people<WH3816> shall curse<WH5344> him<WH1293>; But blessing shall be upon the head<WH7218> of him that selleth it<WH7666>.
He that diligently seeketh<WH7836> good<WH2896> seeketh<WH1875> favor<WH7522>; But he that searcheth<WH1875> after evil<WH7451>, it shall come unto him<WH935>.
He that trusteth<WH982> in his riches<WH6239> shall fall<WH5307>; But the righteous<WH6662> shall flourish<WH6524> as the green leaf<WH5929>.
He that troubleth<WH5916> his own house<WH1004> shall inherit<WH5157> the wind<WH7307>; And the foolish<WH191> shall be servant<WH5650> to the wise<WH2450> of heart<WH3820>.
The fruit<WH6529> of the righteous<WH6662> is a tree<WH6086> of life<WH2416>; And he that is wise<WH2450> winneth<WH3947> souls<WH5315>.
Behold <WH6662>, the righteous shall be recompensed<WH7999> in the earth<WH776>: How much more the wicked<WH7563> and the sinner<WH2398>!
